lead_paragraph: Taoyuan’s mayor said a Trump Organization representative discussed investment opportunities, a possible overture that could complicate U.S.-China relations.

byline.contributor: Megan Twohey contributed reporting from New York. Emily Feng contributed research.

headline.print_headline: Taiwan City Planning a Makeover Says the Trump Organization Showed Interest
headline.main: Taiwan City Planning a Makeover Says a Trump Agent Showed Interest

snippet: Taoyuan’s mayor said a Trump Organization representative discussed investment opportunities, a possible overture that could complicate U.S.-China relations....
abstract: Trump Organization denies meeting with officials in Taiwan to discuss possible investment in multibillion-dollar real estate development project in Taiwan; Cheng Wen-tsan, mayor of Taoyuan City, has asserted he met with Trump representative in September; critics warn such deals, either official or unofficial, will ignite tensions with Beijing and raise conflict-of-interest issues.
